name: Flowpack
body:
### Flow packages by a pack of Flow coders

This is an incubator and repository for high quality TYPO3 Flow packages that proved useful during development of Flow projects.

### Single Sign-on

With the [Flowpack.SingleSignOn.Server](http://github.com/Flowpack/Flowpack.SingleSignOn.Server/) and [Flowpack.SingleSignOn.Client](http://github.com/Flowpack/Flowpack.SingleSignOn.Client) packages we offer a full featured single sign-on solution between multiple TYPO3 Flow applications.

### Contributors

Christopher Hlubek (@chlu), Robert Lemke (@robertlemke)

### Support or Contact

Commercial support of our packages is available. Please use the issue tracker for questions to the community.

### License

Generally we license package under the MIT license, see the specific packages for detailed licensing information.
